code: import*as actions from'./actionTypes';export var addNewPhotoToCanvas=function addNewPhotoToCanvas(imgSrc,imgIndex){return{type:actions.ADD_NEW_PHOTO_TO_CANVAS,payload:{imgSrc:imgSrc,imgIndex:imgIndex}};};export var removePhotoFromCanvas=function removePhotoFromCanvas(id){return{type:actions.REMOVE_PHOTO_FROM_CANVAS,payload:{id:id}};};export var replaceImgSrc=function replaceImgSrc(targetImgUrl,srcImgUrl){return{type:actions.REPLACE_IMG_SRC,payload:{targetImgUrl:targetImgUrl,srcImgUrl:srcImgUrl}};};export var changeFilter=function changeFilter(payload,filterType,imgIndex){return{type:actions.CHANGE_FILTER,payload:{payload:payload,filterType:filterType,imgIndex:imgIndex}};};export var _handleChangePhoto=function _handleChangePhoto(changePhotostatus,imgSrc){return{type:actions.HANDLE_CHANGE_PHOTO,payload:{status:changePhotostatus,imgSrc:imgSrc}};};
